mil7.7.7:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘maṇiratanassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.7.7:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena ekantaparisuddhājīvena bhavitabbaṁ.
mil7.7.7:1.4: Idaṁ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.7.7:2.1: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, maṇiratanaṁ na kenaci saddhiṁ missīyati;
mil7.7.7:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena pāpehi pāpasahāyehi saddhiṁ na missitabbaṁ.
mil7.7.7:2.3: Idaṁ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
mil7.7.7:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, maṇiratanaṁ jātiratanehi yojīyati;
mil7.7.7:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uttamavarajātimantehi saddhiṁ saṁvasitabbaṁ, paṭipannakaphalaṭṭhasekkhaphalasamaṅgīhi sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmiarahantatevijjachaḷabhiññasamaṇamaṇiratanehi saddhiṁ saṁvasitabbaṁ.
mil7.7.7:3.3: Idaṁ, mahārāja, maṇiratanassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
